# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

from __future__ import unicode_literals

from django.db import migrations


BILLABLE = 0
NON_BILLABLE = 1


[docs]def convert_billable_to_boolean(apps, schema_editor):
    Project = apps.get_model("projects", "Project")
    for project in Project.objects.all():
        if project.billable == BILLABLE:
            project.is_billable = True
        elif project.billable == NON_BILLABLE:
            project.is_billable = False
        else:
            raise Exception('%s billable is %s' % (project, project.billable))
        project.save()



[docs]class Migration(migrations.Migration):

    dependencies = [
        ('projects', '0012_add_is_billable'),
    ]

    operations = [
        migrations.RunPython(convert_billable_to_boolean,
                             reverse_code=migrations.RunPython.noop)
    ]
